column4: hi there. Id like to zoom out/scale out a window so that it takes up less pixels on the screen. Kind of like xrandr --scale, but or a single window. Im using ubuntu 10.04 with compiz. Any suggestions?
compiz has some plugin that can take a window and (for example) scale it down to 1/2 its normal size.
nice, ok. I thought Id gone through all their plugins =/.
